nodes.text: Star Tours Flight 1119 was the designation of two Star Tours owned flights at various times.

The first was the designation of a Star Tours-owned flight to Hoth and Bespin at the time of the Raid at Spaceport THX1138. It was stationed at Gate 1A, had arrived on time at 0635 hours and was boarding passengers in preparation for it's next departure at 0730.
The second was the designation of a non-stop flight to Endor offered to passengers by the Star Tours travel agency around 4.3 ABY.
